title: About
content: [Me My name is Ryan. I am a content strategist, editor, writer, and web publisher in Chicago, IL. Friends have told me to write a blog for the last decade. I&rsquo;m just catching up. The Site Content All content for the site is written in clean, semantic markdown in observation of the latest commonmark spec. As a publisher, my intent is to create CMS-independent content that can be easily ported to any static site generator with support for markdown files with embedded yaml. Where markdown falls short, extensions to the syntax are rendered on the client through a handful of JavaScript modules and Hugo Shortcodes. Development All code used for this site is open source and hosted on GitHub. There were many moving parts in the development of this site. Suffice it to say that I built this site with performance and simplicity in mind.]

title: Contact
content: [If you have questions about the site, would like to share tips or feedback, or would like to discuss contract opportunities, please do not hesitate to contact me.]

title: Swiped Out
content: [Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Ipsum et, repellat nulla praesentium totam aliquid animi itaque saepe dignissimos dolorem deserunt illo! Odio labore fugit, modi aspernatur reiciendis inventore porro natus voluptate dolorem accusantium iure quos delectus eum eius, nostrum corporis veniam suscipit officiis. function myFunction(){ console.log(&quot;Here is a string to write to the console&quot;); } One Flew Over the Cuckoo&rsquo;s Nest. Man, when you lose your laugh you lose your footing. All I know is this: nobody&rsquo;s very big in the first place, and it looks to me like everybody spends their whole life tearing everybody else down. But it&rsquo;s the truth even if it didn&rsquo;t happen. He knows that you have to laugh at the things that hurt you just to keep yourself in balance, just to keep the world from running you plumb crazy. If you don&rsquo;t watch it people will force you one way or the other, into doing what they think you should do, or into just being mule-stubborn and doing the opposite out of spite. What do you think you are, for Chrissake, crazy or somethin&rsquo;? Well you&rsquo;re not! You&rsquo;re not! You&rsquo;re no crazier than the average asshole out walkin&rsquo; around on the streets and that&rsquo;s it. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
